column1:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.

Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.

"With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker
